org.openjdk.tools.javac.tree

接口 DocCommentTable

  • 所有已知实现类:
    LazyDocCommentTable

    public interface DocCommentTable
    A table giving the doc comment, if any, for any tree node.

    This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Tokens.Comment getComment(JCTree tree)
      Get the Comment token containing the doc comment, if any, for a tree node.
      String getCommentText(JCTree tree)
      Get the plain text of the doc comment, if any, for a tree node.
      DCTree.DCDocComment getCommentTree(JCTree tree)
      Get the parsed form of the doc comment as a DocTree.
      boolean hasComment(JCTree tree)
      Check if a tree node has a corresponding doc comment.
      void putComment(JCTree tree, Tokens.Comment c)
      Set the Comment to be associated with a tree node.

    • 方法详细资料

      • hasComment

        boolean hasComment(JCTree tree)
        Check if a tree node has a corresponding doc comment.

      • getComment

        Tokens.Comment getComment(JCTree tree)
        Get the Comment token containing the doc comment, if any, for a tree node.

      • getCommentText

        String getCommentText(JCTree tree)
        Get the plain text of the doc comment, if any, for a tree node.

      • getCommentTree

        DCTree.DCDocComment getCommentTree(JCTree tree)
        Get the parsed form of the doc comment as a DocTree. If any errors are detected during parsing, they will be reported via ErroneousTree nodes within the resulting tree.

      • putComment

        void putComment(JCTree tree,
                Tokens.Comment c)
        Set the Comment to be associated with a tree node.
